title: Balance
description: He’s my coach.One chance. That’s all I get when it comes to the Olympics.I’ve given up everything for my chance to train under Konstantin Kournakova.Kova is demanding. He only works with Elite gymnasts.I follow his every command fifty hours a week.He can’t break me. I thrive with the way he pushes me to my limits.Whatever it takes to compete – before it’s too late.He’s everything forbidden. Older. Taken. My father’s friend.I shouldn’t want him – wish he was mine.When I put my mind to it, there’s nothing I can’t do.I’m her coach.Fifty hours a week I tell her what to do. Gymnastics isn’t for the weak and Adrianna is as strong as they come.I’ll break her down so she can build herself up. I know that she wants me, with every secret glance.But I’ll lose everything if I give in. I’m too old for her. I have someone else I love. I’m her father’s friend.Adrianna Rossi is the sum of everything forbidden to me.She makes me wish I could burn it all down just for her.
author: Lucia Franco
